question: Sri Bagh was the name of a residence in Madras belongs to:
explanation: On 16<sup>th</sup> Nov 1937 leaders of Circars and Rayalaseema met at Sri Bagh which is the name of residence of K. Naheswar Rao in Madras. At Sri Bagh an agreement was reached between leaders of Circars and Rayalaseema popularly known as Sri Bagh pact.
